biotools.summary: tRNAstudio is a tool designed to analyze small RNA-seq datasets (single-end or paired-end data) in order to characterize tRNAs. It includes a specific mapping workflow and extracts information on tRNA gene expression (DESeq2 and Iso-tRNA-CP), classification of sequencing reads likely derived from precursor tRNAs (pre-tRNAs) or mature tRNAs (processed tRNAs), tRNA gene sequence coverage, and post-transcriptional tRNA modification levels.

bioschemas.name: tRNAstudio
